set.name: DM25-SP1 Character Premium Deck: "I don't wanna be a Dragon Girl!" Jack‐Pot‐Live!! in Ohryu High School

property.name: Race
property.value: Outrage Dragon/Human

property.name: Rules
property.value: {MACH FIGHTER} (This creature can attack tapped or untapped creatures on the turn you put it.) ■ When you put this creature, look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Reveal one to your opponent, add it to your hand, and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. If the revealed card is fire or nature, you may choose a creature and return it to its owner's hand. ■ Revolution 2: If you have 2 shields or less, this creature gets "shield trigger" when added to your hand from your shield zone. ■ Revolution 0: If you have no shields, this creature gets +10000 power, "speed attacker" and "triple breaker".

property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, tap all your opponent's creatures. Then draw a card. TWINPACT {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ You may put a non-evolution creature that costs 7 or less from your hand. Then return that creature to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ If you have no creatures, this creature costs up to 3 less to summon. {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} {MAGIBOMBER}(7) (Whenever this creature attacks, look at the top card of your deck. You may put a creature that costs 7 or less from the top of your deck or your hand into the battle zone.) ■ After this creature attacks, you may shieldify the top card of your deck.

property.name: Race
property.value: Dispector/Crystal Command Dragon/Angel Command/Melt Warrior

property.name: Rules
property.value: {EX LIFE} (As you put this creature, shieldify the top card of your deck. When this creature would leave, put that shield into your graveyard instead.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, you may cast a spell that costs 7 or less from your hand or graveyard for no cost. After you cast, put it on the bottom of your deck instead of your graveyard. ■ At the end of each of your turns, if you cast a spell that turn, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures that has power 5500 or less, destroy it, then draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ When you put this creature, draw a card. Then return all your opponent's creatures that cost the same as or less than the number of cards in your hand to their owner's hand.

That creature can't attack this turn.) {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may untap one of your other dragon creatures.
